txt.en: You have weakened the Orcs of Ashúrz Maufulug by disarming their traps, leaving them vulnerable to attack.

'You have done well to weaken the Orcs so. There is but one vital task left for you to do, [placeholder]: sever their sword-arm.

'Deep within Ashúrz Maufulug, you will find their captain, whom we have learned is called Morsharpat. He is a vicious creature of great skill in arms. Slay him, and the Orcs will be easy prey.

'When you have accomplished this task, return to me, and I will reward you as best I may.'
Morsharpat is at Ashúrz Maufulug, south and a little west from Echad Glamodúd.\n\nGlamodúd has asked you to defeat Morsharpat, the captain of the Orcs at Ashúrz Maufulug.
'You have defeated Morsharpat? Then victory is nearly ours! You have earned this reward, [placeholder].'
Glamodúd is at Echad Glamodúd, north and a little east from Ashúrz Maufulug.\n\nYou should return to Glamodúd with news of your victory against Morsharpat.
'Morsharpat still lives? Until he is defeated, the Orcs of Ashúrz Maufulug will remain a threat to us.'
'It shall not be long before our forces at Echad Sirion will rain death upon the Orcs of Ashúrz Maufulug!'
Talk to Glamodúd at Echad Glamodúd
